resources.string: HDR is enabled, only Auto scene mode is supported
HDR is not supported in the scene mode other than Auto
High-framerate recording is not supported when using Stabilization/Time lapse/HDR.
Slow motion mode is not supported for the selected video size. Select a lower video size
Stabilization is not supported for the selected video size. Select a lower video size
High speed mode is not supported for the selected video size. Select a lower video size
Only H264 video encoding is supported when HFR is ON
Unsupported video resolution for this encoder type
Raw picture format is not supported in Zero shutter lag mode. Select JPEG
AE bracketing is not supported yet
Video snapshot size is lower than video size, capping to video size. Please select a resolution higher or equal to the current video size.
Changing picture size is not supported in Low Power mode, video size snapshot will be taken. Please select Normal Power mode to allow changing picture size.
Only video size snapshot is supported for this resolution.
Running out of memory, cancelling continuous shot
Flash is not supported in AE bracketing mode
Internal storage space is not enough, switched storage location to SD card
There is no maps app installed to show the location
Advanced features are not supported in continuous shot mode
Continuous shot is not supported when advanced features are enabled
Face detection must be enabled in order to use the beautification feature. Do you want to continue?
To re-focus last photo, tap here

With UbiFocus, your camera will take 5 pictures, each time that you press the shutter button. The 5 pictures will be combined into 1 picture, where everything is in focus. You can choose to re-focus, after you take the picture.
At least one picture has to be chosen.
Direction has changed, stopping panorama capture\u2026
Choose the strength of the beautification.
In dual camera mode, your pictures will be clearer. You can also apply background effects, by editing your dual camera pictures in the Gallery.
With UbiFocus, your camera will take five pictures and combine them into one picture, where everything is in focus. You can choose to re-focus, after you take the picture.
Use OptiZoom when you want to zoom in for a clear picture. You can zoom before, or after taking the picture.
Sports mode helps you take better sports or action shots.\n\nImproves your photos, but has no effect on video recording.
When you are in mixed lighting conditions such as low light and backlit scenes select "HDR" for best possible pictures.
Allows you to take a burst of 10 photos, then you can choose the best one(s).
With ChromaFlash, the lighting in your flash photos will be optimized for all of the people and objects in your pictures. This feature applies only to the back camera.
Sharp photo reduces blur that is due to motion in the scene, or due to hand motion.
Allows you to track and focus a selected person or object while taking pictures or videos. To start, position the focus rectangle on a person or object you want to track.
With Time lapse, you can transform a long video recording into a few seconds of video. This effect applies to videos, but not photos.
Allows you to pan left or right to take a wide landscape photo. You can also pan up or down to take tall photos.
BlurBuster reduces blur from shaky hands. It can be helpful when taking photos in difficult places.
With Pro mode, you can manually control settings for ISO, exposure, white balance, and focus. You will have easy access to all of these advanced settings.
With DeepZoom mode, you can take a photo at 2x or 4x enhanced zoom.
With DeepPortrait mode, you can take selfies with a blurred background. You can use the slider to adjust the amount of the blur.
